data: Allow access to settings an afk message.
Allows you to AFK other players.
Players with this permission will be set to afk after a period of inaction as defined in the config file.
Exempts the user from being auto kicked for AFK
Give this permission to allow players to use /back to go to their death spot
Players with this permission will have back location stored during any teleportation
Allows you to see the balance of other players
Allow a forced refresh of balancetop with "/balancetop force"
Prevents a specified group or player from being banned
Allows banning of players who are offline.  This may allow you to ban exempt players.
Allows the user to change the author of a book.
Allow editing a book belonging to another player.
Allows the user to change the title of a written book
Someone with this permission will not be ignored, even if they are on another persons ignore list.
A permission designed for admins, to intercept all local messages (ignoring the chat-radius).
Allow to be exempt from chat spy
Allows a player to clear all players inventories.
Allow clearing inventory of multiple people at once
Allows you to clear other player's inventory
Allow to reset other another player's kit cooldown using /kitreset.
Allow access to the /customtext command and all aliases.
Allows the player to have a negative balance.
If enabled in the config, this permission allows unsafe enchantments.
Allows you to modify the contents of another players enderchest.
Allows you to see the contents of another players enderchest.
Notify players with this permission on join when there is an update available.
Allows players to give themselves exp.
Allows players to give others exp (if they also have essentials.exp.give).
Allows players to see another players exp.
Allows players to set their own exp.
Allows players to change others exp (if they also have essentials.exp.set).
Allow to specify other player in /ext.
Allows a player to feed another player.
Allow access to the /fireball command. Note: you also need specific permissions for each projectile.
Allows a user to 'spawn' a copy of the firework held in their hands.
Allows to spawn multiple firework effects at once
Players with this command will automatically switch to fly mode if they login whilst floating in the air.
Allow access to all the gamemodes in the /gamemode command
Allows you to change the gamemode of other players.
Allow user to get the position of another player.
Allows you to attack other players while in god mode.
Allows you to see Helpop messages
Point the player's compass at their first home. compass-towards-home-perm needs to be enabled in the configuration.
Allow access to the vanilla bed home.
Allows you to teleport to homes of other players
Allow to use the /ice command on other players.
Allow access to see someones equiped armor slots in "/invsee <name> [armor]"
Players can modify the other players inventory (remove/add items).
Prevents other players from modifying the players inventory.
Gives access to use <effect> in the /itemname command. <effect> examples: bold, reset, gold, dark_red, *
Prevents the material from being used with the /itemname command
Allows spawning of items on the spawn blacklist.
Prevents a specified group or player from being jailed
Allow breaking blocks whilst jailed. (Might also want to add essentials.jail.allow-block-damage)
Allow damaging blocks whilst jailed. (Might also want to add essentials.jail.allow-break)
Player can join when the server is full.
Allow access to the "/jump lock" command
Allows the user to keep their exp on death, instead of dropping it.
Prevents the player from being kicked.
User sees a notification when a user is kicked.
Prevents the player from being killed.
Force player death, even if event is cancelled.
Exempts you from the kit delay feature, this affects signs as well as command.
Allows spawning of kits on other players.
Allows sending mail to all players at the same time
User sees MOTD on connect, and can use the command.
Allows using color codes in /msg command.
Allows using rgb colors in /msg command.
Allows to use the matrix/magic color in the /msg command.
Allows using urls in the /msg command.
Allows to use formatting in the /msg command.
This allows you to message multiple users in a single command.
Prevents a specified group or player from being muted
Allow overriding the max-mute-time set in the config
Allows muting of players who are offline. This may allow you to mute exempt players.
Allows using the near command on another player.
Allows you to color your /nick in <color> using color codes.
Allow access to bypass the /nick blacklist.
Allow to **only** change your nickname's colors (And not the name itself)
Allows to bypass checking if only nickname colors were changed, thus also allowing to change letters.
Gives permission to use hex colors in the /nick commend using the &#RRGGBB format.
Gives you permission to give other players a nick name
Removes the command cost of all commands.
This allows you to pay multiple users in a single command.
This allows you to pay offline players.
Allow access to the "/potion apply" command
Allows adding multiple commands to a single powertool.
Allows you to change the time of another online player.
Exempts players from the 'pvp delay' option in the config file.
Allow to change the pweather of someone else
Allows access to toggle replying to last message recipient
Repair all also repairs equipped armor.
Allow to specify other player in /rest.
Allows the user to see why a user is banned.
Allow to see someone's ip-address in /seen
Allows the user to search IPs for username matches.
Allow to see someone's location in /seen
Allows the user to see accounts with the same IP in /seen
Allow selling of items from your hand
Allows the player to right click a bed during daytime to update their 'bed' home.
Allows player to have multiple homes, or create named homes.  Required for 2+ homes.
Raise the multiple home limit to a setting defined in the config file.
Removes the cap on the number of homes people are allowed (if they have multiple homes).
Allows you to change another users home location.
Allows you to delete the homes of other players.
Allows using [enchant] signs to perform unsafe enchantments
Used to override any protections. Typically given to mods & admins
Used to override the creator only protection on trade signs. Typically given to mods & admins
Allow collecting of protected trade signs
Allow to join silently, and get put in vanish mode
Suppress leave/quit messages for users with this permission.
Allow changing the owner of an existing player skull.
Allow creating skulls belonging to other players.
Allows the spawning of a skull, default if the player isn't holding a skull.
User isn't required to be sleeping, for time to be reset.
Allow to be exempt from forced teleporting to spawn on join
Allows you to teleport other people to spawn
Allow access to adjust delay in /spawner command.
Allows the spawning of stacked mobs.
Allows you to bypass the speed limits set in the config.yml
This permission will allow a player to change fly speed only.
Allows you to modify the speed of other players.
This permission will allow a player to change walk speed only.
Prevents the holder from being sudo'ed by another user.
Allow access to the /sudo command for multiple people.
Allow to bypass the /back command cooldown
Allow to bypass the /tpa command cooldown
Allows players to move while waiting for teleport.
Prevents a specified group or player from being tempbanned
Allows temp-banning of players who are offline.  This may allow you to ban exempt players.
Allows bypassing config file max ban time limit.
User is allowed to change the time of the world.
Allow changing time of all worlds
Allows jailing of players who are offline.  This may allow you to jail exempt players.
Allow players to teleport another player.
Allow to teleport to an exact location
Allow teleporting to a player's logout location using /tpoffline
Allows the player to recieve an unlimited stack of any item.
Allows the player to recieve an unlimited use of empty/lava/water buckets.
Allows the player to gift/remove another player with an unlimited stack.
Allows players who are vanished to attack other players.
Allows you to see a vanished player.
Allow access to the "/essentials version" command
Specifies whether you can view warp list with /warp.
Allow executing the /fly command for someone else.
Allow executing the /god command for someone else.
Allow executing the /msgtoggle command for someone else.
Allow executing the /socialspy command for someone else.
Allow executing the /tptoggle command for someone else.
Allow executing the /vanish command for someone else.
Allow to see someone's ip-address and location in /seen
Removes the command cost of a given command.

Allows access to the editsign command
Allows access to exceed the 15-character-per-line limit
Allows access to hex colors in the /editsign command using the &#RRGGBB format
This allows you to use any color code within the /editsign command, NOT including hex colors (&#RRGGBB).
Allows you to /editsign in <color> using color codes.
Allow access to the Allows spawning of specific books only, from book.txt./give command.
Manually adds the commands from a plugin to this group's /help. Name is all lowercase.
Manually adds a command from a plugin to this group's /help. Name is all lowercase.
Allows essentials commands to be used while jailed (requires regular perm).
Allows access to all created kits
Give access to a single kit, where [kitname] is the name of an existing kit.
Allows setting a spawner to any mob type
Allows setting a spawner to a specific mob type
Allows setting the delay of a spawner.
Allows placing a spawner of any type
Allows placing a spawner of a specific mob type
Allow the spawning of all mobs
Allow access to spawn a specific mob
Allows the player to recieve an unlimited stack of [itemid]
Allows the player to recieve an unlimited stack of [itemname]
Allows overwriting of all existing warps.
If you have per-warp-permission set to true in the config.yml then you can limit what warps players can use. This also controls what players would see with /warp and /warpinfo.
Allows players access to a specific world.
Allows players access to a specific world.

Players with this permission will receive a notification when a ban is set.
Players with this permission will receive a notification when an IP ban is set.
Players with this permission will receive a notification when a ban is set.
Players with this permission will receive a notification when a ban is removed.
Players with this permission will receive a notification when an IP ban is removed.
Allows access to each enchantment type.
Allows access to each enchantment type.
Allows access to each enchantment type.
If enabled in the config, this permission allows unsafe enchantments.
If enabled in the config, this permission allows unsafe enchantments.
If enabled in the config, this permission allows unsafe enchantments.
Allow 'author' meta to be used in item spawning.
Allow 'author' meta to be used in item spawning.
Allows spawning of books with pre-filled content from books.txt
Allows spawning of books with pre-filled content from books.txt
Allow 'lore' meta to be used in item spawning.
Allow 'lore' meta to be used in item spawning.
Allow 'title' meta to be used in item spawning.
Allow 'title' meta to be used in item spawning.
Allows spawning of stacks above normal max stack size
Allows spawning of stacks above normal max stack size
Allow adding potion effects when someone goes into vanish
Allows access to /back when the destination location is within the specified world
Allow seeing someones ip address in the /whois command.
Allow access to the /gamemode creative command. Also requires essentials.gamemode
Allow access to the /gamemode survival command. Also requires essentials.gamemode
Allow access to the /gamemode adventure command. Also requires essentials.gamemode
Allow access to the /gamemode spectator command. Also requires essentials.gamemode
If a player has this, they can set their username to any value. Use with caution, as this has the potential to break userdata files.
This permission allows you to send private messages to users that have disabled them with /msgtoggle.
Allows to use colors in the /nick command
Allows to use magic effect in the /nick command
Allows to use formatting in the /nick command
Allows the user to keep their inventory on death, instead of dropping it.
Allows the user to execute the /back command for other players
Get notified when an muted player tries to talk
Players with this permission are excluded from the balancetop
Give this permission to users to prevent them using this type of item in /hat
Disable blocking the removing of hats with curse of binding
This allows you to color your chat messages in any color using color codes, NOT including hex colors (&#RRGGBB).
This allows you to color your chat messages in <color> using color codes.
This allows you to format your chat messages using format codes.
This allows you to use the matrix/magic color in your chat messages.
This allows you to use hex color formatting in your chat messages. Format is &#RRGGBB.
This allows you to send global questions, used if a chat-radius is configured.
This allows you to send global messages, used if a chat-raidus is configured.
Toggles whether you are talking in shout mode.
Toggles shout mode for other players.
A permission designed for admins, to intercept all local messages (ignoring the chat-radius).
This allows you to use urls in your chat messages.
Allows people to build when using permission systems which don't support build toggles.
Allows executing <action> for <material>, action being place, break, interact, craft, drop or pickup.
Allows a player to recieve protect alerts.
Users with this permission do not trigger protect alerts.
Allows a player to ignore the break blacklist.
Allows a player to ignore the block placement blacklist.
Allows a player to ignore the usage blacklist.
Allows a player to be targeted by mobs.
When prevent PVP is set to true, this allows players to still PVP. Both attacker and defender need to have this permission.
Admin override to prevent admins from dying
Allows you to hide your country and city from people who have permission essentials.geoip.show
Shows the GeoIP location of a player, if the GeoIP module is installed.
